attributes.action: Nationalise all key public transport systems, networks, and companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the poor performance and inefficiency of the majority of public transport systems, I propose that the government nationalises all key rail companies and bus companies.
I have been infromed by reliable sources that for all the faults of previous nationalisaion schemes, these were nothing compared to the delays caused nowadays by privatisation.
